data.title: BACKSTAGE NASHVILLE! DAYTIME HIT SONGWRITERS SHOW feat. Gary Nicholson, Dylan Altman, Aaron Raitiere and Ray Stephenson with Gloria Anderson and Eric Landes
data.meta_description:
Hear country music’s biggest songs and the stories behind them at Nashville’s only DAYTIME hit songwriters show. 

Featuring:


Gary Nicholson



- "One More Last Chance” (Vinc
data.text:
3rd and Lindsley

All Ages

$20.00 - $125.00

Hear country music’s biggest songs and the stories behind them at Nashville’s only DAYTIME hit songwriters show.

Featuring:

Gary Nicholson

- "One More Last Chance” (Vince Gill)

- "Squeeze Me In" (Garth Brooks and Trisha Yearwood)

- "He Won't Ever Be Gone" (Willie Nelson)

- "She Couldn't Change Me" (Montgomery Gentry)

- "Trouble With The Truth" (Patty Loveless)

- "Worry B Gone” (Chris Stapleton, Guy Clark, Willie Nelson and Kenny Chesney)

- "Lone Star Blues" (George Strait)

- "Sanctuary" (Chip Esteen and Lennon & Maisy from ABC's Nashville)

- "The Reason Why" (Vince Gill)

Dylan Altman

- “Watch The Wind Blow By” (Tim McGraw)

- “Take A Little Ride” (Jason Aldean)

- “Barefoot Blue Jean Night” (Jake Owen)

- “Take It On Back” (Chase Bryant)

- “Baby I’m Home” (Trace Adkins)

- “Young As We Will Ever Be” (Will Hoge)

- “Baby Got Gone” (Kenny Wayne Shepherd)

Aaron Raitiere

- "Country Money" (Miranda Lambert)

- "For The Birds" (Miranda Lambert)

- "Tall Guys" (Maren Morris)

- "Voodoo Doll" (Ashley McBryde)

- "Sparrow" (Ashley McBryde)

- “Sunrise Tells The Story" (Midland)

- "Just Friends" (Caylee Hammack)

- "DRUGS" (Anderson East)

- "Heroes" (Natalie Hemby)

- "Needing A Beer" (Montgomery Gentry)

- "Dixie Again" (Dillon Carmichael)

- "Look What I Found" (Lady Gaga & Bradley Cooper A Star Is Born)

Ray Stephenson

- “Hemingway’s Whiskey” (Kenny Chesney, Kris Kristofferson and Guy Clark)

- “Red River Blue” (Blake Shelton and Miranda Lambert)

- “Willie’s Guitar” (Willie Nelson, Merle Haggard and John Anderson)

- “Honkytonk Road” (Wade Bowen, Randy Rogers, Cody Canada, Sean McConnell and Walt Wilkins)

- “Magdalene” (Guy Clark, Joe Ely and Kevin Welch)

- “Heroes” (Guy Clark)

- “Leanin’ On A Lonesome Song” (Gord Bamford)

BACKSTAGE NASHVILLE PRE-SHOW OPENING ACTS (begins at 12:05 PM): Gloria Anderson and Eric Landes

Doors open at 11 AM. Food and beverages served when doors open!

VIP Reserved seating available (each VIP Reserved table can seat up to 4 people). Don’t miss your chance to grab the best seats in the house!
